Articles.Content: I'm trying out contract mode and one of the early contracts wants a report at a certain location? "Near Jebediah's Vision". Where the heck is that? And how near is "near".

Open your map view (or use the tracking station) and focus in on the planet or moon that the contract specifies. You'll see one or more markers on the surface of the body. One of them should be "Jebediah's Vision" and you can check by mousing over the marker.

yeah it will be on the map somewhere.

I thought this thread was about the creepypasta lol
You know, i wonder how the world is seen in Jeb's eyes. Not the IVA view, i mean.
It's a randomly generated point on a body that you have to visit and do the science at. Find it in the map view.

I thought this thread was about the creepypasta lol

Oh. My. God.

I completely forgot about this, and didn't think there were any KSP pastas. I googled it only to find out I wrote it. Super weird feeling.
